transArray.content: The room is too small. The sister at the front desk took the initiative to help me change rooms.

Hello dear guest! Thank you for your recognition of the service attitude of our friends at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Your encouragement is very important. If life is a journey, we are willing to be your warmest site. Due to the hotel decoration time, the hotel room area and the new opening There are indeed some gaps in the store. Although the store is small, the facilities in the room are complete. The hotel rooms and supporting facilities in the public area can meet your daily living needs. We will continue to work hard and use the attentiveness of our work to exchange for your peace of mind when you check in. Shuxin, all the hotel staff look forward to your every visit and wish you a happy life. Manager: Zhang Minghui
